name: UhomebyU-tec
0:
”Alexa, lock the front door.”
”Alexa, unlock the front door.”
”Alexa, is the front door locked?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We are excited to introduce the U home by U-tec smart home skill, an advanced solution designed to allow seamless control of U-tec products from anywhere. With this skill, you can use Alexa to interact with your U-tec smart devices at your convenience.

Here is what you can do with the U home by U-tec smart home skill:
- Control your ULTRALOQ smart door locks via the Alexa app and Alexa Voice, anytime, anywhere.
- Manage your U-tec Smart Switch through the Alexa app and Alexa Voice, right from your comfort zone.
- Operate your U-tec Smart Plug using the Alexa app and Alexa Voice, irrespective of your location.
- Adjust your Bright A19 Smart Bulb settings with the Alexa app and Alexa Voice, regardless of where you are.

Please note the following requirements:
- For ULTRALOQ U-Bolt, U-Bolt Pro, Lever, UL1, UL1 Combo, UL3 BT (1st and 2nd Gen), or UL300, an ULTRALOQ Bridge is required to connect the lock to WiFi. 
- For ULTRALOQ Latch 5, U-Bolt WiFi, and U-Bolt Pro WiFi, Bolt Fingerprint and Bolt NFC, no ULTRALOQ Bridge is necessary as WiFi is built-in.
- For Bright, U-tec Smart Switch, and Smart Plug, no additional equipment is required as WiFi is built-in.

If you share your ULTRALOQ devices with other users via the U-tec app, they can also link their U-tec account with Alexa and use Alexa to lock/unlock these devices. Please note that this feature is only available to Admin users of the lock. Normal and temporary users will not be able to use this feature.

Should you require further assistance or have any queries, feel free to visit https://support.u-tec.com or email us at appdev@u-tec.com.

Enjoy a smart and secure life with U-tec!
